question: It is true that an Act is not a law officially passed by the government.

It is true that an Ordinance is a temporary law made by the President or Governor.
It is true that an Amendment does not involve changes to an existing law.
It is true that the Motor Vehicles Act was amended to impose higher fines for traffic violations.
